Thanks for your work so far.

so actually when we download image from pinterest it's automatically saved with extended name behind the jpg files become "example.jpg?b=t", y'all friend can check on your storage and find Pins in DCIM file, all your download file is there, you can remove those extend name and you will get your imag...Full Reviewso actually when we download image from pinterest it's automatically saved with extended name behind the jpg files become "example.jpg?b=t", y'all friend can check on your storage and find Pins in DCIM file, all your download file is there, you can remove those extend name and you will get your image back, I know its a bit complicated but that's the only way to fix your image manually.
